sentences.sentence: Emus and kangaroos can't walk backwards.
There are more than 50 EMUs of this type in service.
sentences.translation: 有超过50的动车组在服务这类。

sentences.sentence: And ostriches and emus, too, are bare-necked-in their case to radiate away the heat generated when they run.
sentences.translation: 另外驼鸟和食火鸟也是光脖子的，它们这是为了加快释放奔跑过程中产生的热量。
